headline: Pentair to Report Q2 Earnings: What to Expect From the Stock?
summary: PNR eyes Q2 earnings growth despite slowing pool volumes and weakness in residential-driven segments.

raw.headline: Pentair to Report Q2 Earnings: What to Expect From the Stock?
raw.summary: PNR eyes Q2 earnings growth despite slowing pool volumes and weakness in residential-driven segments.

headline: Pentair Announces Lance Bonner as Executive Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary
summary: LONDON, July 17, 2025--Pentair plc (NYSE: PNR), a leader in helping the world sustainably move, improve and enjoy water, life’s most essential resource, announced today that it has named Lance Bonner as Executive Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary. Bonner will join the Company effective August 11, 2025 and report to John Stauch, Pentair President and CEO.
